Detailed Description

A radiobutton action describes an action which toggles itself on executing between a selected state and a deselected state. A radiobutton action defines a "one of many" choice and hence makes only sense as part of a radiobutton group. A radiobutton group is defined by the class RadioButtonGroup and takes care, that only one radiobutton-action is selected.
See also:
RadioButtonGroup

RadioButtonControl

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RadioButtonAction::RadioButtonAction (   ) 
 

RadioButtonAction::RadioButtonAction (  Dispatcher *  dispatcher,
RadioButtonGroup *  rb_group,
const WCHAR *  text,
BOOLEAN  selected = FALSE,
BOOLEAN  enabled = TRUE,
INT  value = 0
)  [explicit]
 

Parameters:
dispatcher Dispatcher which will be informed about property changes of the action. It is recommended always to specify a dispatcher.
rb_group Radiobutton group the radiobutton belongs too. Only one radiobutton of the radiobutton group may get selected.
text Text of the action.
selected Specifies whether the toggle action is in the selected or non selected state.
enabled Specifies whether the action is enabled. Usually actions which are not enabled may not be executed.
value Value to the toggle action. This is useful when the name or position of a toggle action is not sufficient.

Obsolete - see AbstractToggleAction::GetDeselectedIcon.

Reimplemented from AbstractToggleAction.

RadioButtonGroup* RadioButtonAction::GetGroup (   )  [inline]
 

Returns the group the radiobutton belongs to.Only one radiobutton of the group may get selected. If one radiobutton A will get selected although radiobutton B is currently selected, then radiobutton B will automatically get deselected.

void RadioButtonAction::SetGroup (  RadioButtonGroup *  rb_group  ) 
 

Sets the group the radiobutton belongs to. Only one radiobutton of the group may get selected. If one radiobutton A will get selected although radiobutton B is currently selected, then radiobutton B will automatically get deselected.

BOOLEAN RadioButtonAction::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id,
UINT16  object_id
) 
 

Used by Aragon to read out the windows property out of the resource parser. It is not allowed for an application developer to invoke this method in a direct manner.
